mapper.select: select count(*) from USERS where NICK_NAME=#{nickname}
select * from USERS where NICK_NAME=#{nickName} and PASSWORD=#{password}
select USER_ID,NICK_NAME,INTRO,HEAD_IMG from USERS where NICK_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') limit 10

select u.USER_ID,u.NICK_NAME,u.BIRTHDAY,u.INTRO,u.SEX,ADDRESS,u.HEAD_IMG,r.STAR_ID from USERS u left join USER_GROUP g on g.USER_ID=u.USER_ID left join RELATIONSHIP r on r.GROUP_ID =g.GROUP_ID where u.NICK_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param2},'%') limit #{param1.offsetInDB},#{param1.pageSize}
